20070000.Original_Text: 미답지를 개척할 생각을 하니 아아~ 너무 떨려!\n어라, 우리 구면이죠. 소협?  <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>수월평원</>에서 뵈었잖아요?
20070000.English_Text: Ah, I'm so nervous at the thought of pioneering uncharted territory! \nHey, it's our sphere.
20070000.Chinese_Text: 啊，一想到开拓未知领域，我就很紧张！\n嘿，这是我们的领域。

20070001.English_Text: (He sighs, saying that he remembers the embarrassing past)
20070001.Chinese_Text: （他叹了口气，说他还记得那段尴尬的往事）

20070002.Original_Text: 저는 소협 같은 분을 기다리고 있었어요!\n탐사에는 위기가 있어야 성과도 있는 법이라고, 단주님이 말씀하셨거든요!
20070002.English_Text: I was waiting for someone like a small gang! \nDanju said that there are results in exploration only when there is a crisis!
20070002.Chinese_Text: 我在等一个小帮派！\nDanju说只有遇到危机才有探索的结果！

20070003.Original_Text: 그러니까 위기 창출은 무림 제일인 소협과 함께라면 엄청난 성과를 거둘 수 있겠죠!\n같이 가주실 거죠? 소협!
20070003.English_Text: So, in creating a crisis, with Moorim's No. 1 Sohyup, great results can be achieved!\nWould you like to go with us?
20070003.Chinese_Text: 所以，在制造危机中，有了Moorim的No.1Sohyup，可以取得很好的成绩！\n你愿意和我们一起去吗？

20070004.Original_Text: (왠지 논리가 이상하지만... 이전에 한 일이 있으니 함께 가주겠다고 한다)
20070004.English_Text: (The logic is a bit strange... but he said he'd go with him because he's done something before)
20070004.Chinese_Text: （这个逻辑有点奇怪……但他说他会和他一起去，因为他之前做过一些事情）

20070005.Original_Text: 감사해요. 소협! \n이번 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>의 탐사 목적은, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>가라앉은 묘지</>에서 일어난 사태 파악이에요!
20070005.English_Text: Thank you. Sohyeop! \nThe purpose of this <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Flower Bed</> is to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The Sunken Cemetery</>
20070005.Chinese_Text: 谢谢。Sohyeop！\n这个<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>梅花床</>的目的是为了<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>沉没墓地</

20070006.English_Text: Then I'll see you at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The Sunken Cemetery</>, Sohyeok!

20070007.Original_Text: 여기 적힌 것 보셨어요, 소협? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수와족</>이 멸망한 직접적인 원인이 침식 탓이 아니라는 거요!
20070007.English_Text: Did you see what's written here, Minhyeok? That <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>The Suwa</> were not directly caused by erosion!
20070007.Chinese_Text: 你看到这里写的是什么了吗，Minhyeok？那个<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>诹访</>不是由侵蚀直接造成的！

20070008.Original_Text: 직접적인 원인은 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>... 그렇다면 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수와족</>이 멸망한 지도 그리 오랜 시간이 지나지는 않았다는 뜻이예요.
20070008.English_Text: The direct cause is the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</>... Then the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Suwa</>may be extinct
20070008.Chinese_Text: 直接原因是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>……那么<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>诹访</>可能已经灭绝了

20070009.Original_Text: 혹은 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>이 우리가 알고 있는 것보다 더 오래전부터 존재했을 수도 있겠죠... \n진실은 어느 쪽일까요?
20070009.English_Text: Or <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blackdawn</> may have been around longer than we know... \nwhich is the truth?
20070009.Chinese_Text: 或者 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blackdawn</> 的存在时间可能比我们知道的要长......\n这是事实吗？

20070010.Original_Text: 어머 소협! 이런 데에서 만나다니 우연이네요!
20070010.English_Text: Oh my gosh! It's a coincidence that we met in a place like this!
20070010.Chinese_Text: 天啊！居然在这种地方认识！

20070011.Original_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>버림 받은 자들의 늪</>에는 무슨 일인지 묻는다)
20070011.English_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Ask what's going on in the Swamp of the Forsaken</>)
20070011.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>询问被遗忘者沼泽发生了什么</>)

20070012.Original_Text: 탐사를 위해서죠! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검은새벽단의 족적</>을 조사하기 위해서 왔거든요!\n사방천지가 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>거미 인간</> 천지라 발이 묶였지만요.
20070012.English_Text: For exploration! I'm here to investigate the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Traces of the Black Dawn</>!
20070012.Chinese_Text: 为了探索！我是来调查<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>黑色黎明的踪迹</>的！

20070013.Original_Text: 돌아가지도 못해서 난처하던 차에 소협이 이곳에 오신 거예요! 이런 걸 천재일우의 기회라 하던가요?
20070013.English_Text: Sohyeop came here when he was embarrassed because he couldn't even go back! Did you say that this is an opportunity for a genius Ilwoo?
20070013.Chinese_Text: 素协在尴尬的时候来了，因为他连回去都回不去了！你说这是天才伊尔乌的机会吗？

20070014.English_Text: (He said he would help him escape)

20070015.Original_Text: 탐사할 대상이 있는데 도망칠 수는 없죠!\n이 인근을 조사하려는데, 도와주실 거죠. 소협?
20070015.English_Text: I have something to explore, but I can't run away!\nI want to investigate this area, will you help me?
20070015.Chinese_Text: 我有东西要探索，但我不能逃！\n我要调查这片区域，你能帮我吗？

20070016.English_Text: (I can't help it... I'll help you)

20070017.Original_Text: 고마워요, 소협! 늪의 조사는 끝났으니, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>어둠 숲</>의 진로를 확보해주세요!\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>거미 인간</> 때문에 못  움직이겠지 뭐예요~
20070017.English_Text: Thanks, Sohye! The swamp investigation is over, so please secure a path to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dark Forest</>!\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>
20070017.Chinese_Text: 谢谢，Sohye！沼泽调查结束了，所以请确保通往<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>黑暗森林</>的路径！\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>

20070019.Original_Text: 저도 비슷한 걸 찾았어요.\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>가라앉은 묘지</>의 일도 그렇고, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>의 마수는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해룡산맥</> 전체에 뻗어있나 봐요.
20070019.English_Text: I also found something similar.\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The Sunken Graveyard</>, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</>
20070019.Chinese_Text: 我也发现了类似的东西。\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>沉没的墓地</>，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>

20070020.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>어둑시니의 변이</>도 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>이 원인인듯 해요.\n이들은 무슨 속셈으로 지역 전체를 더럽히고 있는 걸까요...
20070020.English_Text: It seems that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Dick's mutation</> is also caused by <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</>.
20070020.Chinese_Text: 看来<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>迪克的变异</>也是由<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>引起的。

20070021.Original_Text: 거기! 그래, 너 말이야. 너. 좀 한가해 보인다? <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>초소</> 한 바퀴 돌아도 넉넉할 만큼? 안 그래?
20070021.English_Text: There! Yeah, you mean. You. You look a little laid back?
20070021.Chinese_Text: 那里！是的，你的意思是。你。你看起来有点悠闲？

20070022.English_Text: (If you have a request, please do it properly)

20070023.Original_Text: ...<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</>이 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>초소의 물자</> 보급을 담당하게 됐거든.\n세세한 관리는 성미에 안 맞지만, 일.이.다.보.니 어쩔 수 없이 맡게 됐지.

20070024.Original_Text: 그런데 저 우락부락한 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>이나 도도한 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양대원</>한테 뭐가 필요한지 물어볼 엄두가 안 나는 거야!
20070024.English_Text: But I don't even dare to ask what the sloppy <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> or the arrogant <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Regionate</> need.
20070024.Chinese_Text: 但我什至不敢问什么是马虎的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>或傲慢的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Regionate</>

20070025.Original_Text: 그래서 말인데. 너는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>과도, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>과도 인연이 깊잖아? 네가 내 대신 물어봐 줄 수 있을까?
20070025.English_Text: So, you're also closely related to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>, aren't you?
20070025.Chinese_Text: 所以，你也和<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</>和<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>关系密切，是吗？

20070026.English_Text: (...I can't help it. They say I understand)
20070026.Chinese_Text: （……我忍不住了。他们说我明白了）

20070027.Original_Text: 고마워! 너는 정말 좋은 녀석이란 말이야!
20070027.English_Text: Thank you! You're such a nice guy!

20070028.Original_Text: ...중대장님. 이 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>초소</>. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>침구</>가 너무 불편합니다.\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>급조한 초소</>라지만 돌덩이 위에서 자는 것 같다고요.

20070029.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>침구</>의 보급은 우선순위가 낮다네. 부피는 큰 데 없어도 큰 상관은 없으니까.\n임무 동안은 불평 말게.
20070029.English_Text: The supply of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>bedding</> is a low priority. It doesn't matter if it's bulky or not. \nDon't complain while on duty.
20070029.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>床上用品</>的供应是次要的。不管它是否笨重。\n值班时不要抱怨。

20070031.Original_Text: 하나, 둘... <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검</>이 부러지기 일쑤네.\n하기야, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>풍백문의 검</>만 한 것을 계속 공급하는 게 쉬운 일은 아니겠지.
20070031.English_Text: One, two... <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>The sword</> is often brittle.

20070032.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검</>을 아끼자니 실력에 녹이 슬 것 같고, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검</>을 아끼지 않자니 임무에 지장이 갈 것 같고... 어쩌면 좋담?
20070032.English_Text: If you spare the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sword</>, your skill will rust, and the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sword</> is the mission
20070032.Chinese_Text: 如果你放过<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>剑</>，你的技能就会生锈，而<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>剑</>就是任务

20070033.English_Text: Hey, Sohyuk? What's going on there?

20070034.English_Text: (No, I'm sorry for disturbing your training)

20070036.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>침구</>와 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검</>... 조달하기 어렵진 않아. 문제는 물자 보급의 안정성... \n너 말이야. 좀 한가해 보이는데...
20070036.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bedding</> and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sword</>... Not difficult to procure. The problem is the stability of supply.
20070036.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>床上用品</>和<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>剑</>...不难获得。问题是稳定性

20070037.Original_Text: (부탁할 게 있으면 제대로 부탁하라고, 두 번 말하게 하지 말라 한다)
20070037.English_Text: (If you have something to ask, please do it properly, don't make me say it twice)
20070037.Chinese_Text: （有什么想问的，请好好做，别逼我说两遍）

20070038.Original_Text: ...내가 소심해서 남한테 부탁하는 게 쉽지 않아... 부탁할게. \n보급이 지나가는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>잿빛 하늘 숲</> 한 번 싹 쓸어줘. 믿는다?
20070038.English_Text: ...I'm timid, so it's not easy to ask someone else... I'll ask you.
20070038.Chinese_Text: ……我胆子小，不好问别人……我问你吧。

20070039.Original_Text: 큰일이네, 이대로면 환약의 제조양을 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>약재</>가 따라갈 수가... 뭐라도 하지 않으면...
20070039.English_Text: It's a big deal, if it goes on like this, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>medicine</> can't keep up with the amount of pills... If you don't do anything...
20070039.Chinese_Text: 这有什么大不了的，再这样下去，<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>药</>跟不上药丸的量……如果你什么都不做

20070041.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월지부</>에서 챙겨온 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>약재</>가 떨어져 가서요. \n수색도 쉽지 않고 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>에 의한 피해도 큰 탓이겠지요.
20070041.English_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>medicine</> brought from the Haewol Branch</> ran out. \nSearching is not easy <
20070041.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>从Haewol分店带来的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>药</>用完了。\nSearching不容易<

20070042.Original_Text: 이대로면 침 바르고 하루 쉬면 나을 거라는 말밖에는 할 수가 없을 판입니다.
20070042.English_Text: If this is the case, I can only say that I will get better with acupuncture and a day off.
20070042.Chinese_Text: 如果是这样，我只能说，通过针灸和休息一天，我会好起来的。

20070043.Original_Text: 상황을 타개하기 위해선 임시방편이라도 쓸 수밖에 없는데... \n소협. 문주께는 비밀로 좀 도와주시겠습니까?
20070043.English_Text: In order to overcome the situation, I have no choice but to use a temporary measure... \nSohyup. Could you help Moonju in secret?
20070043.Chinese_Text: 为了克服这种情况，我不得不采取临时措施......\nSohyup。你可以秘密帮助文珠吗？

20070044.English_Text: (If it's not difficult, I'll help you)

20070045.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>포식자 구릉지</>에서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>짐승 피</>를 모아 와 주십시오.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>약</>을 만드는 데에는 신선한 물이 필요한데, 여기 수원은 오염되어 물 대신 쓰려고요.

20070047.Original_Text: 정말 감사합니다 소협. 힘든 부탁이었을 텐데, 들어주셔서 감사합니다!
20070047.English_Text: Thank you very much Sohyup. It must have been a difficult request, but thank you for listening!
20070047.Chinese_Text: 非常感谢Sohyup。这肯定是一个困难的要求，但谢谢您的聆听！

20070048.Original_Text: 고맙습니다 소협! 이 정도면 한동안 임시변통은 될 것입니다!\n이게 버티는 동안 보급이 도착해야 할 텐데 말입니다.
20070048.English_Text: Thank you, Sohyeok! This will be a makeshift for a while!

20070049.Original_Text: 걱정이 태산입니다. 하필이면 함께 지원 온 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>의약방 사람</>도 그런 독에 미친...
20070049.English_Text: Worrying is a lot. In all likelihood, the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>pharmaceutical person</> who came along with the application was also crazy about that kind of poison...
20070049.Chinese_Text: 担心很多。很可能，随申请一起来的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>药剂师</>也对这种毒药很着迷……

20070050.Original_Text: 흠 어디 쓸만한 사람 없나... 아, 거기 소협.\n혹시 공력을 향상시킬 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>풍백문의 새 환단</>에는 관심 없어요?
20070050.English_Text: Hmm, is there anyone there who can use it... Ah, there's a small group.\nAren't you interested in <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Pungbaekmun's new Phantom</>, which will improve your aggression?
20070050.Chinese_Text: 嗯，有没有人可以使用它......啊，有一个小团体。\n你对<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>风白门的新幻影</>感兴趣吗？

20070051.English_Text: (It is said that the drug dealer does not deceive you)

20070052.Original_Text: 입문하자마자 의약방의 천재로 칭송받고 있는 저에게 그런 섭섭한 말을! \n이 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>환단</>, 만들기만 하면 문파원들의 실력이 부쩍 늘 거라고요.
20070052.English_Text: Such a disappointing thing to say to me, who is praised as a genius at the drugstore as soon as I enter the school! Just by making \n this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Hwandan</>, the skills of the members of the school will increase significantly.
20070052.Chinese_Text: 对我这么失望的话，我一进学校就被称赞为药店天才！只是通过\n这个<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>焕丹</>，

20070053.Original_Text: 물론 소협께서 재료를 구할 만한 실력인지 확인한 후 부탁드리겠지만요.\n무리하셨다 다치면 저만 귀찮아지잖아요?
20070053.English_Text: Of course, I'll ask you after confirming that the small cooperative has the skills to get the materials.
20070053.Chinese_Text: 当然，我会在确认小合作社有获得材料的技能之后再问你。

20070054.Original_Text: 재료가 궁금하시면... <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>어둠 숲</>의 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>맹독충</>을 처치해보시겠어요?\n그 정도면 제가 부탁드릴 수 있을 것 같아요.
20070054.English_Text: If you're curious about the ingredients... Would you like to kill the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Venomworm</> in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dark Forest</>?
20070054.Chinese_Text: 如果您对成分感到好奇……您想杀死 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dark 中的 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Venomworm</>

20070055.Original_Text: 고생하셨어요, 소협! 이것만 있으면 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>을 위한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>새로운 환단</>을 만들 수 있을 거예요!
20070055.English_Text: You did a great job, Sohyup! With just this, you can create a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>New Phantom</> for <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>
20070055.Chinese_Text: 你做得很好，Sohyup！有了这个，你就可以为<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun 创建一个<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>New Phantom</>

20070056.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Ask what you plan to use with the blood of a mortal</>)
20070056.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>问问你打算用凡人的血做什么</>)

20070057.Original_Text: 어머, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>환단의 제조 원리</>가 궁금하신 건가요? \n소협께서는 고생하셨으니 제가 특별히 알려드릴게요!
20070057.English_Text: Oh my, are you curious about <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>how the phantom is made</>?
20070057.Chinese_Text: 哦，天哪，你对 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>幻影是如何制作的</>感到好奇吗？

20070058.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>이독치독</>이라는 말 아시나요? 독으로 독을 이긴다! \n독을 이겨내면서 사람은 더욱 강한 몸을 손에 넣게 되죠.
20070058.English_Text: Do you know the saying <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Toxic poison</>? Poison defeats poison! \nBy overcoming poison, a person gains a stronger body.
20070058.Chinese_Text: 你知道<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>毒药</>这句话吗？毒胜毒药！\n战胜毒药，人会变得更强壮。

20070059.Original_Text: 이 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>환단</>을 먹고 지독~하게 앓고 나면, 누구든 더 강해질 수 있을 거예요! 어때요, 소협도 탐이 나시죠?
20070059.English_Text: After eating this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Hwandan</> and getting really sick, anyone can become stronger!
20070059.Chinese_Text: 吃了这个<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>焕丹</>，病倒了之后，任何人都可以变得更强壮！

20070061.Original_Text: 아쉽네요. 소협께라면 제가 몰래 한 알 드릴 수도 있었는데!
20070061.English_Text: I'm sorry. If it was Sohyup, I could have secretly given you one!
20070061.Chinese_Text: 对不起，如果是Sohyup，我可以偷偷给你一个！

20070062.Original_Text: 소협. 바쁘신 줄은 알지만, 혹시 청을 들어주실 수 있으실까요?
20070062.English_Text: Sohyup. I know you're busy, but could you please help me?
20070062.Chinese_Text: Sohyup。我知道你很忙，但你能帮我吗？

20070064.Original_Text: 저는 이전에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>에게 잡혀있던 포로였습니다.\n많은 동료들이 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검은새벽단의 실험체</>로 희생당했죠.
20070064.English_Text: I was previously a prisoner of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blackdawn</>.

20070065.Original_Text: 저만 살아남아 어찌나 고통스러웠는지요.\n그들을 구할 수 없었으니 무덤이라도 만들어주고 싶습니다.
20070065.English_Text: It was so painful that only me survived. I couldn't save them, so I want to make a grave for them.
20070065.Chinese_Text: 太痛苦了，只有我一个人活下来。我救不了他们，所以我想为他们造一个坟墓。

20070066.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>버림 받은 자들의 늪</>에 있는 그들을 처치하고, 혹시 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>사람이었을 적의 물건</>을 갖고 있다면 회수해 주시겠습니까?
20070066.English_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Defeat them in the Swamp of the Abandoned</> and remove any <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>possibly human objects</>
20070066.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>在被遗弃的沼泽中击败他们</>并移除任何<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>可能是人类的物体</>

20070068.Original_Text: 정말 감사합니다 소협. 그들도 분명 고마워할 것입니다.
20070068.English_Text: Thank you so much, Sohyeop. They will definitely appreciate it.
20070068.Chinese_Text: 非常感谢你，苏赫。他们一定会很感激的。

20070069.English_Text: Are you back, Sohyup? What happened to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Kids</>.
20070069.Chinese_Text: 你回来了吗，Sohyup？<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>孩子们</>发生了什么事。

20070070.English_Text: (Show <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Relics</> along with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Letter with Tae Su-jeong's name</>)
20070070.Chinese_Text: （显示<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>文物</>和<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>写有泰秀贞名字的信</>）

20070071.Original_Text: 그런 것을 가지고 있는 이가 있었습니까... 어쩔 수 없죠.\n저는 사실 포로가 아니라, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>이었습니다.
20070071.English_Text: Did anyone have anything like that... I can't help it.\nI wasn't actually a prisoner, I was <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blackdawn</>.
20070071.Chinese_Text: 有没有人遇到过这样的事情......我忍不住了。\n我实际上不是囚犯，我是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blackdawn</>。

20070072.Original_Text: 이런 몸이니까요. 원래 몸으로 돌아가기 위해 포로들로 실험을 하고 있었죠.\n그곳에 있던 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>버려진 병사</>들은 제가 변이시킨 이들입니다.
20070072.English_Text: It's a body like this. I was experimenting with prisoners to return to their original body.\nThe <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Abandoned Soldiers</> there were mutated by me.
20070072.Chinese_Text: 是这样的身体。我在让囚犯们做实验，让他们恢复原来的身体。\n那里的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>废弃士兵</>是我变异的。

20070073.Original_Text: 어느 날, 실험실로 끌려가는 아이를 보고 정신이 들더군요.\n이후 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>에서 도망쳤지만 한 일이 사라지는 건 아니죠.
20070073.English_Text: One day, I woke up to seeing a child being taken to the lab.\nAfter that, I ran away from <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</>, but what I've done doesn't go away.
20070073.Chinese_Text: 有一天，我醒来看到一个孩子被带到实验室。\n在那之后，我逃离了<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</>，但我所做的

20070074.Original_Text: 그래도 소협 덕분에 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>그들의 무덤</>은 만들어줄 수 있게 되어 다행입니다.\n정말 감사합니다. 소협.
20070074.English_Text: Nevertheless, I'm glad I was able to make <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>their grave</> thanks to the small group. \nThank you very much.
20070074.Chinese_Text: 尽管如此，我很高兴我能够让 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>他们的坟墓</>多亏了这个小组。\n非常感谢。

20070100.Original_Text: 조용히 시켜줘, 죽고 싶지 않아! 그 녀석들이 분명 내게 복수하러 찾아올 거야!
20070100.English_Text: Shut up, I don't want to die! They'll definitely come to get my revenge!
20070100.Chinese_Text: 闭嘴，我不想死！他们一定会来报复我的！

20070101.English_Text: (Calm down and tell me what's going on)
20070101.Chinese_Text: （冷静下来，告诉我发生了什么事）

20070102.Original_Text: 소용없어. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>변이된 녀석</>들이 분명히 복수하러 올 거야. \n매일 밤 밖에서 외치고 있다고. 나를 죽이겠다고!
20070102.English_Text: It's no use. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>mutated bastards</> will definitely come for revenge. \nCrying outside every night. They're going to kill me!
20070102.Chinese_Text: 没用。<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>变异的混蛋</>肯定会来报复的。\n每晚都在外面哭。他们要杀了我！

20070103.Original_Text: 사라진 심장을 내 심장으로 바꿔 끼울 거라고 말하고 있어.\n어떡하지? 어디까지 도망치면 잡히지 않을까?
20070103.English_Text: I'm telling you I'll replace the missing heart with my own. \nWhat should I do? How far away can I get caught?
20070103.Chinese_Text: 我告诉你，我会用自己的心代替丢失的心。\n我该怎么办？我能在多远的地方被抓住？

20070105.Original_Text: 아, 소협. 그자를 아십니까? 큰일이 났습니다.\n그자가 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>피난처</> 밖을 나가 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>오염된 대지</>로 향했다지 뭡니까.
20070105.English_Text: Ah, So-Kyung. Do you know him? Something has happened.\nHe <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Shelter</> goes outside <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Pollution
20070105.Chinese_Text: 啊，So-Kyung。你认识他吗？出事了。\nHe <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Shelter</> 走出去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>

20070106.Original_Text: 그자는 본디 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>의 말단이었던 자인데, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>의 실태를 보고 겁먹었는지, \n이 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>피난처</>로 도주했습니다.
20070106.English_Text: He was originally the one who was at the end of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</>, the actual situation of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</>
20070106.Chinese_Text: 他本来就是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>结尾的那个，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明的实际情况

20070107.Original_Text: 도망 온 후에도 죄책감에 시달려 정신을 놓아버렸는데, 어찌 갑자기 마을을 나갔는지...\n설마...
20070107.English_Text: Even after I ran away, I lost my mind due to the feeling of guilt, how did I suddenly leave the village...
20070107.Chinese_Text: 我跑了之后，也因为愧疚而失去理智，我怎么突然离开了村子……

20070109.Original_Text: 죄책감에 시달리다 자포자기해 마을을 나간 것 같습니다.\n소협! <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>오염된 대지</>에서 그를 찾아봐 주시겠습니까?
20070109.English_Text: It seems that he left the village in desperation due to a sense of guilt. \nSohyeop! Could you find him in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The Contaminated Land</>?
20070109.Chinese_Text: 他似乎是因为愧疚而绝望地离开了村庄。\nSohyeop！你能在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>被污染的土地</>中找到他吗？

20070110.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Howoon Jang</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sujeong Tae</> are having a conversation. What's going on?)
20070110.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Howoon Jang</> 和 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sujeong Tae</> 正在谈话。发生了什么事？）

20070111.English_Text: (He looks serious, but asks what's going on)
20070111.Chinese_Text: （他看起来很严肃，但问发生了什么事）

20070112.Original_Text: 아, 이 친구와 무덤을 만드는 얘기를 하고 있었거든요.\n남은 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>의 탈주자도 저희 둘 뿐이니까요.
20070112.English_Text: Oh, I was talking about making a grave with this friend. \nThe remaining <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</> are the only escapees from us.
20070112.Chinese_Text: 哦，我在说和这个朋友一起挖坟。\n剩下的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>是我们唯一的逃生者。

20070113.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>I've heard from Taesu-jeong</> before, but asks if he has yet)
20070113.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>我之前听说过 Taesu-jeong</>，但问他有没有)

20070114.Original_Text: 이 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>피난처</>의 살림도 넉넉지 않다 보니, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>무덤을 만드는데 필요한 재료</>를 모으지 못해서요.
20070114.English_Text: This <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Shelter</> doesn't have enough money, so I couldn't gather <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>materials needed to make the tomb</>.
20070114.Chinese_Text: 这个<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>庇护所</>没有足够的钱，所以我无法收集制作所需的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>材料

20070115.Chinese_Text: 正如 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Howoon Jang</> 所说的那样。

20070116.English_Text: (Then he says he will help collect <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Materials</>)
20070116.Chinese_Text: （然后他说他会帮忙收集<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>材料</>）

20070117.Original_Text: 정말이십니까, 소협? 그러면 부탁드리겠습니다.\n다른 것들은 어떻게든 할 수 있는데, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비석이 될 큰 돌</>을 구할 수 없더군요.
20070117.English_Text: Really, Sohyeok? So please.\nI can do anything else, but I couldn't find the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Big Stone</> to be the headstone.
20070117.Chinese_Text: 真的吗，Sohyeok？所以拜托了。\n我可以做任何其他事情，但我找不到 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Big Stone</> 作为墓碑。

20070118.Original_Text: 이 인근에서는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>검은새벽단 보급소</>에 있을듯하군요. 부탁 드리겠습니다. 소협.
20070118.English_Text: It seems to be in the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Blackdawn Supply Depot</> around here. Please.
20070118.Chinese_Text: 它似乎在附近的 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Blackdawn Supply Depot</> 中。拜托了。

20070119.English_Text: You did a great job. Sohyeop. The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>steel material</> you asked for was...
20070119.Chinese_Text: 你做得很好。Sohyeop。你要求的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>钢铁材料</>是……

20070121.Original_Text: 평평하고 커다래서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비석</>으로 쓰기 딱이군요. 정말 감사합니다. 소협.
20070121.English_Text: It's flat and large, so it's perfect for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>stele</>. Thank you so much. Sohyeok.
20070121.Chinese_Text: 它又大又平，非常适合<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>stele</>。非常感谢。Sohyeok。

20070122.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>의 손에 희생된 사람들도 저세상에서 기뻐할 것입니다.\n짐을 놓은 것 같아 마음이 놓입니다.
20070122.English_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Those who fell at the hands of the Black Dawn</> will rejoice in the afterlife.
20070122.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>那些落入黑色黎明之手的人</>将在来世欢欣鼓舞。

20070123.Original_Text: (죄책감을 느끼는 것을 비난하진 않지만 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>피난처</>의 사람들을 잘 보살피는 게 좋으리라 말한다)
20070123.English_Text: (I'm not accusing you of feeling guilty, but I'd say you'd better take good care of the people at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Refuge</>)
20070123.Chinese_Text: （我不是在指责你感到内疚，但我想说你最好照顾好 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Refuge</> 的人）

20070124.Original_Text: 물론이죠. 바깥 분들과의 연도 닿았으니, 이곳의 사정도 나아지겠죠.\n저는 계속 이곳을 보살필 겁니다.
20070124.English_Text: Of course. Now that I have reached out with people outside, things will get better here. I will continue to look after this place.
20070124.Chinese_Text: 当然。现在我已经和外面的人接触了，这里的情况会好起来的。我会继续照顾这里。

20070125.Original_Text: 저는 이 자를 도우며 함께할 생각이고요.
20070125.English_Text: I plan to help this person and join them.
20070125.Chinese_Text: 我打算帮助这个人并加入他们。

20070126.Original_Text: 소협의 도움에 부끄럽지 않도록 최선을 다하겠습니다.
20070126.English_Text: I will do my best not to be ashamed of the small cooperative's help.
20070126.Chinese_Text: 我会尽量不以小合作社的帮助为耻。

20070127.Original_Text: 하아, 이 일을 어쩐담... 당장 나무를 캐지 않으면 모두가 곤란해지는데, \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도끼</>가 배달되지 않았다니.
20070127.English_Text: Hey, what's going on with this... If we don't dig up the wood right now, everyone gets in trouble, and the \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>axe</> didn't get delivered.
20070127.Chinese_Text: 嘿，这是怎么回事......如果我们现在不挖木头，每个人都会遇到麻烦，\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>斧头</>没有'

20070129.Original_Text: 바쁘신 나으리 신경 쓰이게 해드린 것 같아 마음이 편치 않습니다만, \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>받기로 한 물건</>이 오지를 않아서요.
20070129.English_Text: I'm not at ease because I seem to have bothered you, busy, but \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>the item I was supposed to receive</> didn't arrive.
20070129.Chinese_Text: 我不放心，好像打扰到你了，很忙，但是\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>我应该收到的东西</>没有到。

20070130.Original_Text: 피난처 지원 차 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</>에서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>새 도끼</>를 보내주시기로 하여, \n피난처 목수들이 전부 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도끼</>를 기다리고 있었거든요.
20070130.English_Text: Shelter support car <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</> to send you <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>New Ax</>, \nShelter Carpenter
20070130.Chinese_Text: Shelter support car <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</> 送你<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>New Ax</>，\nShelter Carpenter

20070131.Original_Text: 그런데 예정이 바뀌어 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도끼</>를 보내줄 수 없다지 뭡니까?\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>있던 도끼</>는 도저히 쓸 수 없는데, 지원은 없어졌다지...
20070131.English_Text: But the schedule has changed and you can't send the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>axe</>?\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>the ax</>
20070131.Chinese_Text: 但是时间表已经改变，你不能发送<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>斧头</>？\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>斧头</>

20070132.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</>이 그럴 곳이 아닌데... 아무튼, 방도를 생각해보기는 해야겠고...)
20070132.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>is not the place for that... Anyway, I'll have to think of a way...)
20070132.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>不是那个地方……反正我得想办法……)

20070133.English_Text: (I ask if you could use <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Ax of the Black Dawn</>)
20070133.Chinese_Text: （我问你是否可以使用<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>黑色黎明之斧</>）

20070134.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검은새벽단의 도끼</>요? 영 수가 없다면 그거라도 쓰고 싶은 마음입니다만...
20070134.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Ax of the Black Dawn</>? If I can't speak, I'd like to use that, but...
20070134.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>黑色黎明之斧</>？如果我不会说话，我想用它，但是……

20070135.Original_Text: (그건 걱정하지 말고, 자신만 기다리고 있으라 한다)
20070135.English_Text: (Don't worry about that, just wait for yourself)

20070136.Original_Text: 누구냐! 정체를 밝... 어라? 너는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>잖아?\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>검은새벽단의 무기고</>까지는 무슨 일이야?
20070136.English_Text: Who are you? Identify yourself... Huh? Are you <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>
20070136.Chinese_Text: 你是谁？表明你自己……嗯？你是 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>

20070137.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Explaining what's going on with Moonwind</>, asks what <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonlight</> is all about)
20070137.Chinese_Text: （<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>解释月风的情况</>，询问<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>月光</>的全部内容）

20070138.Original_Text: 내가 여기 온 건 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검은새벽단의 무기</>를 분석해서 이에 대항할 수 있는 \n더 좋은 제련법을 알아내기 위해서야.
20070138.English_Text: I'm here to analyze <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Dark Dawn's weapons</> to find a better smelting method to counter it.
20070138.Chinese_Text: 我来这里是为了分析<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>黑暗黎明的武器</>，寻找更好的冶炼方法来对付它。

20070139.Original_Text: 광물도 어떻게 제련하는지에 따라 그 강도가 천차만별이거든.\n근데 잠깐, 방금 뭐라고 했어?
20070139.English_Text: The strength of minerals varies greatly depending on how they are smelted.\nBut wait, what did you just say?
20070139.Chinese_Text: 矿物的强度取决于它们的冶炼方式。\n但是等等，你刚刚说什么？

20070140.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</>에서 지원해주기로 했던 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도끼</>가 도착하지 않았다고?\n우리는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도끼</>를 구해서 피난처로 보냈을 텐데...

20070141.Original_Text: 어떻게 된 일인지 경위를 파악하는 건 나중에 하고, \n중요한 건 피난처의 나무꾼들에게 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도끼</>를 보내는 거겠네.
20070141.English_Text: I'll figure out what happened later, \nImportant is to send <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>axes</> to the woodcutter at the shelter.
20070141.Chinese_Text: 我稍后会弄清楚发生了什么，\nImportant 是将 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>斧头</> 发送给庇护所的樵夫。

20070142.Original_Text: 미안하지만 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검은새벽단의 무기</>를 회수해 주겠어?\n이 무기를 재료로 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도끼</>를 새로 만들어 보낼까 하는데.
20070142.English_Text: I'm sorry, can you retrieve the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blackdawn weapon</>?
20070142.Chinese_Text: 对不起，你能取回<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blackdawn 武器</>吗？

20070143.Original_Text: (그거라면 걱정하지 않아도 된다고 한다. 자신이 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도끼</>를 모았으니...)
20070143.English_Text: (They say you don't have to worry about that. Since you've collected <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>axes</>...)
20070143.Chinese_Text: （他们说你不必担心这个。因为你已经收集了 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>轴</>...）

20070144.Original_Text: 지금 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</>이 사교도 놈들이 쓰는 무기를 전달해주라는 거야?\n난 맡기로 한 일은 허투루 넘기지 않아.
20070144.English_Text: Now, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>are you telling me to hand over the weapons these cultists use?
20070144.Chinese_Text: 现在，<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>你是要我交出这些邪教徒使用的武器吗？

20070145.Original_Text: 네게는 미안하지만 부탁할게. 너도 기왕이면 나무꾼들에게 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>제대로 된 도끼</>를 주고 싶을 것 아냐.
20070145.English_Text: I'm sorry to you, but I beg you. You wouldn't want to give the woodcutter a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>proper ax</> if at all possible.
20070145.Chinese_Text: 我很抱歉，但我求求你。如果可能的话，你不会想给樵夫一把<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>合适的斧头</>。

20070146.English_Text: (It is said that they have gathered weapons as requested)
20070146.Chinese_Text: （据说他们已经按照要求收集了武器）

20070147.Original_Text: 고마워. 나쁜 놈들 주제에 정말 좋은 철을 쓴단 말이야.\n어디서 정기적으로 보급받기라도 한 것처럼...
20070147.English_Text: Thank you. You put really good iron on the bad guys topic. \n Like you got it regularly from somewhere...
20070147.Chinese_Text: 谢谢你。你在坏人话题上的表现非常好。\n就像你经常从某个地方得到它一样......

20070148.Original_Text: 아무튼 이 정도면 부탁받았던 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도끼</>를 제작하기 충분한 양이야.\n피난처에는 내가 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도끼</>를 주며 사정을 설명할게.
20070148.English_Text: Anyway, this is enough to make the requested <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>axe</>.
20070148.Chinese_Text: 无论如何，这足以使请求的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>斧头</>。

20070149.Original_Text: 너는 돌아가서 쉬도록 해.\n내가 억지를 부렸어도 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</>의 일인데, 도와줘서 고마워.
20070149.English_Text: You should go back and rest.\nEven if I force you, it's <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>, thank you for your help.
20070149.Chinese_Text: 你还是回去休息吧。\n就算我勉强你，也是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>，谢谢你的帮助。

20070150.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</>의 이름에 먹칠을 해도 유분수지! 어떻게 이런 짓을...
20070150.English_Text: Even if you paint the name of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>, it's still oily! How could you do this...
20070150.Chinese_Text: 就算你把<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>的名字涂上，也是油油的！你怎么能这样……

20070151.English_Text: (Says to calm down and asks what's going on)

20070152.Original_Text: 아, 너구나 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>. 너도 알고 있는 이야기니 잘 됐어.\n피난처에 지급하기로 했던 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도끼</>가 배달되지 않았던 것, 기억하지?
20070152.English_Text: Oh, it's you <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>. It's a good story you know.
20070152.Chinese_Text: 哦，是你<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>。你知道这是个好故事。

20070153.Original_Text: 경위를 파악해보니, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>도끼 배달부</>가 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도끼</>를 들고 내뺐지 뭐야.\n게다가 추적을 피하려고 금경철문의 장부를 엉망으로 해놓았더라고!
20070153.English_Text: When I figured out how, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The ax delivery man</> took the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>axe</> and pulled it out.
20070153.Chinese_Text: 当我弄清楚怎么做时，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>斧头送货员</>拿起<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>斧头</>把它拔了出来

20070154.Original_Text: 덕분에 범인을 알고도 추적하지 못 하고 있는 상황이야.\n아마 전부 수습하고 나면 그 녀석은 먼 곳으로 도망쳤겠지.
20070154.English_Text: Thanks to this, we are in a situation where we have not been able to track down the culprit even after we know it.
20070154.Chinese_Text: 多亏了这一点，我们处于一种情况，即使在我们知道罪魁祸首之后，我们也无法追查到罪魁祸首。

20070155.English_Text: (If that's the case, he says he'll chase after him instead)
20070155.Chinese_Text: （如果是这样，他说他会追他的）

20070156.Original_Text: 정말? 하긴, 너도 녀석에게 좋은 감정이 있을 리가 없지...\n좋아, 내가 파악한 정보를 알려줄게.
20070156.English_Text: Really? Well, there's no way you can't have a good feeling for him either...\nOkay, I'll give you the information I found out.
20070156.Chinese_Text: 真的吗？嗯，你也不可能对他没有好感……\n好吧，我把我查到的资料告诉你。

20070157.Original_Text: 그 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>사기꾼</>은 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>피난처</>에 머물다, 내가 온다는 말에 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>불타는 대지</>로 도망쳤다고 해.\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>불마자</>들보다 이 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>달빛바람</>이 더 무서웠나보지?
20070157.English_Text: The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Cheater</> stays in the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Refuge</>, when I say I'm coming <textColor=[110:
20070157.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>骗子</>留在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>避难所</>，当我说我要来时<textColor=

20070158.Original_Text: 잡히기만 해봐라, 상상을 현실로 만들어 주겠어.
20070158.English_Text: Just try to catch it, I'll make your imagination a reality.
20070158.Chinese_Text: 试着抓住它，我会让你的想象成为现实。

20070160.Original_Text: 버, 벌이라니 무슨 말씀이십니까?\n저는 갑자기 쫓아오는 사람이 있어 도망쳤을 뿐, 맹세코 결백합니다!
20070160.English_Text: Bur, what are you talking about?

20070161.Original_Text: (허리춤에 차고 있는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>돈주머니와 금경철문 표식</>이나 숨기고 말하라 한다)
20070161.English_Text: (Hide the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>money bag and the gold-gyeongcheol gate mark</> worn on the waist and tell them to tell)
20070161.Chinese_Text: （隐藏<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>钱袋和腰间佩戴的金京哲门印</>，告诉他们说）

20070162.Original_Text: 아, 아니, 이런. 내가 초보적인 실수를 하다니...\n좋습니다요 소협. 얼마 드리면 눈감아주실 겁니까?
20070162.English_Text: Oh, no, oh my. It's okay to make a rudimentary mistake...
20070162.Chinese_Text: 哦，不，哦，天哪。犯一个基本的错误也没关系……

20070163.English_Text: (Stop talking nonsense, go to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonlight</> and confess your sins)

20070164.Original_Text: 아이고, 나는 망했네. 망했어.... 한탕 해보려던 나의 꿈이 이렇게...
20070164.English_Text: Oh my gosh, I'm ruined. I'm ruined.

20070165.Original_Text: 어머, 소협! 오랜만이에요. 역시 사건 있는 곳에는 언제나 소협이 계시는군요! 저로서는 다행이지만요!
20070165.English_Text: Oh my gosh! It's been a while. As expected, there's always a small group wherever there is an incident! It's fortunate for me!
20070165.Chinese_Text: 天哪！好久不见。果然，出事的地方总会有一小群人的！真是我的福气！

20070166.Original_Text: (본 적이 있던 것 같기도 하고, 없던 것 같기도 하고 기억이 가물가물하다고 한다)
20070166.English_Text: (It seems like I've seen it, I don't think I've seen it, but my memory is fuzzy)
20070166.Chinese_Text: （好像见过，好像没见过，只是记性模糊了）

20070167.Original_Text: 후후, 어떨까요? 그보다, 좀 도와주지 않으실래요?\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>어둑시니</>계의 혁신이 될 발견에 소협도 참여하시는 거예요!
20070167.English_Text: Whoah, what about it? More than that, would you like some help? \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>You're Dark</>You're also participating in a discovery that will revolutionize the world!
20070167.Chinese_Text: 哇，怎么样？更重要的是，你需要帮助吗？\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>你是黑暗的</>你还参与了一项将彻底改变

20070168.Original_Text: 저는 각 지역의 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>어둑시니 의 표본</>을 모아, \n지역을 불문하고 만연하고 있는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>어둑시니 문제</>를 해결하고 싶어요.
20070168.English_Text: I collected samples of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>dark</> from each region, \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>dark, which is prevalent in all regions.
20070168.Chinese_Text: 我从每个地区收集了 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>dark</> 样本，\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>dark，这在所有地区都很普遍。

20070169.Original_Text: 여기 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>잿빛 하늘 숲</>에도 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>어둑시니</>가 있다는 소식을 듣고, 달려왔다구요!\n소협도 협조하고 싶으실 거예요. 그쵸?
20070169.English_Text: When I heard that <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Ashen Sky Forest</> also had <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Dark</>, I ran to you!
20070169.Chinese_Text: 当我听说<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>灰空森林</>也有<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>暗</>时，我跑到你面前了！

20070170.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>The dim problem</> If possible, I will cooperate)
20070170.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>昏暗问题</>如果可以，我会配合)

20070171.Original_Text: 고마워요, 소협! 분명히 소협의 도움은 연구에 큰 도움이 될 거예요!
20070171.English_Text: Thank you, Sohyeok! I'm sure her help will be of great help to the research!
20070171.Chinese_Text: 谢谢你，Sohyeok！我相信她的帮助会对研究有很大帮助！

20070172.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>싱싱한 표본</>이 이렇게 많다니! 소협의 실력은 최고네요!\n덕분에 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>어둑시니의 비밀</>을 한 꺼풀 벗겨낼 수 있겠어요!
20070172.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fresh specimens</> that there are so many! The skill of the small gang is the best! \nThanks to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Dick's
20070172.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>新鲜标本</>竟然有这么多！小帮派的功力是最好的！\n感谢<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>

20070173.Original_Text: 그나저나 참 이상한 일이죠. \n아무런 연고도 없는 지역에 산발적으로 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>어둑시니</>들이 생겨나는 이유는 뭘까요?
20070173.English_Text: By the way, it's really strange. \nWhy are <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Dark You</> appear sporadically in unrelated areas?
20070173.Chinese_Text: 顺便说一下，这真的很奇怪。\n为什么 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Dark You</> 偶尔会出现在不相关的区域？

20070174.Original_Text: 거기, 지나가던 소협. 잠시 이리와 청을 들어주시지요.
20070174.English_Text: There, a small gang passing by. Come here for a moment and listen to the request.
20070174.Chinese_Text: 那边，有一个小团伙路过，过来一会，听听请求。

20070175.English_Text: (They say you're too cheeky about the subject you're asking for)
20070175.Chinese_Text: （他们说你对你要求的主题太厚脸皮了）

20070176.Original_Text: 저는 그래도 됩니다. 저는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>요.리.사</>니까요. \n이 초소 모든 이의 식사를 책임지고 있단 말입니다.
20070176.English_Text: I can do that. I'm <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Yo.Li.Sa</>. \nThis post is responsible for everyone's meals.
20070176.Chinese_Text: 我可以。我是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Yo.Li.Sa</>。\n这个帖子负责大家的饭菜。

20070177.Original_Text: 소협 역시 제 부탁을 들어주셔야 할 겁니다.\n저녁 식사에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>불마자 발톱</>이 들어가길 원치 않으신다면 말이죠.
20070177.English_Text: You'll have to do me a favor too, if you don't want <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burn Claw</>in your dinner.
20070177.Chinese_Text: 你也得帮我一个忙，如果你不想在你的晚餐中 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burn Claw</>。

20070178.Original_Text: (어쩔 수 없지... 뭘 부탁하고 싶은지 묻는다)
20070178.English_Text: (I can't help it... asks what I want to ask you)
20070178.Chinese_Text: （我忍不住了……问我想问你什么）

20070179.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>식자재 보급</>을 담당하고 있는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>에 가서 어떻게 된 일인지 물어봐 주십시오. \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>보급</>이 올 때가 지났는데 오지 않아서요.
20070179.English_Text: Please go to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> in charge of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Food material distribution</> and ask what happened. \n
20070179.Chinese_Text: 请到负责<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>食材配送</>的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>询问发生了什么事。\n

20070180.English_Text: (If it's such an important task, I'll definitely do it)
20070180.Chinese_Text: （如果是这么重要的任务，我一定会去做的）

20070181.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Supply of food</> conveys the saying of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Jeongdojeong</>)

20070182.Original_Text: 안 그래도 말을 전하려 했는데...\n제가 활촉에 손가락을 베여서요. 오늘은 사냥을 못  나갈 듯합니다.
20070182.English_Text: I was still trying to tell you...\nI cut my finger on the tip of the bow. I don't think I'll be able to go hunting today.
20070182.Chinese_Text: 我还想告诉你……\n我被弓尖割伤了手指。我想我今天不能去打猎了。

20070183.Original_Text: (화살촉에 베인 정도면 그냥 사냥을 할 수 있는 것 아니냐 묻는다)
20070183.English_Text: (I ask if it's possible to just hunt if it's cut by an arrowhead)
20070183.Chinese_Text: （我问如果它被箭头切割是否可以狩猎）

20070184.Original_Text: 활을 쏘는 것은 섬세한 일입니다.\n작은 상처라도 신경 쓰이면 자세가 흐트러지고, 제대로 쏠 수 없게 되죠.
20070184.English_Text: Shooting a bow is a delicate thing. \nIf you care about even a small wound, your posture will be disturbed and you will not be able to shoot properly.
20070184.Chinese_Text: 射弓是一件很微妙的事情。\n如果你在意哪怕是一个小伤口，你的姿势都会受到干扰，你将无法正常射击。

20070185.English_Text: (...In the time to convince him, he just said he would get <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>planting</>)
20070185.Chinese_Text: （……在说服他的时候，他只是说他会得到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>种植</>）

20070186.Original_Text: 그럼 부탁드리겠습니다.\n조심하시죠, 소협. 조금이라도 다치면 무공에 흐트러짐이 생기니, 크나큰 손해겠지요.

20070187.Original_Text: 오셨습니까? 소협. 혹여 상처를 입지는 않으셨는지요.
20070187.English_Text: Are you here? Sohyeok. Were you not hurt by any chance?
20070187.Chinese_Text: 你在吗？昭赫。你没有受伤吗？

20070188.Original_Text: (자신은 무사하고, 그것보다 초소 사람들을 위해 어서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>재료</>를 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>요리사</>에게 전달해달라 한다)
20070188.English_Text: (He's safe, and for the people in the post more than that, get <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Ingredients</> to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Cook</>
20070188.Chinese_Text: （他很安全，对于帖子中的人来说，更重要的是，将 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>成分</> 交给 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Cook<

20070189.Original_Text: 그렇군요. 상처를 살피려면 일단 잘 먹어야 하죠. 제 생각이 짧았습니다.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>식재</>는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>요리사</>께 잘 전달 드리겠습니다.
20070189.English_Text: Okay. You have to eat well to check the wounds. My thoughts were short. \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Planting</> is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>
20070189.Chinese_Text: 好吧。你得好好吃饭才能检查伤口。我的想法很短。\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>种植</>是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>

20070190.Original_Text: 세상에 그게 말이 되나? 벼락을 맞고 산 인간이라는 게 세상에 어디 있나?
20070190.English_Text: Oh my God, does that make sense? Where in the world is a human being struck by lightning?
20070190.Chinese_Text: 天哪，这有道理吗？世界上哪里会有人被闪电击中？

20070191.Original_Text: 내가 두 귀로 똑똑히 들었다니까 그러네!\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>호운</> 그 양반이 벼락을 맞고도 멀쩡히 살아났다고 하는 걸 말이야!
20070191.English_Text: That's because I heard it clearly with both ears!\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Houn</> That yangban survived being struck by lightning!
20070191.Chinese_Text: 那是因为我两只耳朵都听的清清楚楚！\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Houn</> 那个羊半被雷劈活了！

20070192.Original_Text: 증거는 있어? 증좌가 있어야 터무니없는 말을 믿든 말든 할 것 아냐?
20070192.English_Text: Is there any evidence? Don't you have to have a gift card to believe or not to believe nonsense?
20070192.Chinese_Text: 有证据吗？信不信废话不用有礼品卡吗？

20070193.Original_Text: 증거 있지! 나도 아무 말이나 믿고 말하고 다니는 게 아니라우?\n그때 옆에 있던 나무에 번개 맞은 자국이 남았다지 뭐유?
20070193.English_Text: I've got proof! I'm not saying I'm not even talking about anything?
20070193.Chinese_Text: 我有证据！我不是说我什么都没说？

20070194.Original_Text: 그러면 어디 그 나무 한 번 보러 가보자고!
20070194.English_Text: Then let's go see that tree!
20070194.Chinese_Text: 那我们去看看那棵树吧！

20070195.Original_Text: 아이고, 근데 그게 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>검은새벽단 본거지</>에 있던 것이라지 않수? <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>보급소</>...라던가?
20070195.English_Text: Oh, but isn't that the one from <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Blackdawn headquarters</>? <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Supply depot</>..
20070195.Chinese_Text: 哦，但那不是来自 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Blackdawn 总部</>的那个吗？<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>补给站</>..

20070196.Original_Text: 아니, 그러면 확인해보러 갈 수가 없잖아? 확인 한 번 해보려다 목 떨어질 일 있어?
20070196.English_Text: No, then you can't go check it out, can you? Is your neck going to drop while trying to check it?
20070196.Chinese_Text: 不行，那你不能去检查一下是不是？检查的时候你的脖子会掉下来吗？

20070197.Original_Text: 아니, 소협은 여기 무슨 일로...는 그 표정을 보니 이미 들킨 것 같군요. 하하하...
20070197.English_Text: No, what's going on here... Seeing that expression on her face, it looks like she's already been caught. Hahaha...
20070197.Chinese_Text: 不对，这是怎么回事……看她的表情，好像已经被抓住了。哈哈哈……

20070198.Original_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>피난처</>에서 들었던 벼락 맞은 이야기의 진실에 관해 묻는다)
20070198.English_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Ask about the truth of the thunderbolt story you heard in Shelter</>)
20070198.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>询问你在庇护所听到的霹雳故事的真相</>)

20070199.Original_Text: 다른 이들이라면 얼씬도 못 할 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>보급소</>에 흔적이 있다고 거짓말을 한 거였는데.\n소협 때문에 저도 참 난처해졌습니다!
20070199.English_Text: You lied that there were traces of <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Supply Station</>, which no one else could even get to.
20070199.Chinese_Text: 你谎称有<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>补给站</>的痕迹，其他人甚至无法到达。

20070200.English_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Coming all the way to the supply center</> is unfair, so I complain to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Houn</>)
20070200.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>一路来到供应中心</>是不公平的，所以我向<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Houn抱怨</>

20070201.Original_Text: 하하, 그건 좀 참아주시지요.\n제가 거짓말을 한 이유는 피난처 사람들이 앞날을 비관하지 않기를 바래서였으니까요.
20070201.English_Text: Haha, be patient with that.\nI lied because I didn't want the people of the shelter to be pessimistic about the future.
20070201.Chinese_Text: 哈哈，耐心点。\n我撒谎是因为我不想收容所的人对未来感到悲观。

20070202.Original_Text: 피난처 사람들은 이곳에서 도망칠 엄두도 내지 못하고, \n언젠가는 붙잡힐 것이라고 두려움에 떨고는 했습니다.
20070202.English_Text: The people of the shelter would not even dare to run away from this place, and trembled in fear that one day they would be caught.
20070202.Chinese_Text: 收容所的人，连逃跑都不敢，怕有朝一日被抓到。

20070203.Original_Text: 저는 그것이 안타까워, 거짓말을 하게 됐죠.\n번개 맞고도 살아남은 내가 이 마을에 있으니, 여러분도 안전합니다! 라고.
20070203.English_Text: I'm sorry about that, so I lied. \nI'm the one who survived the lightning strike in this town, so you're all safe!
20070203.Chinese_Text: 我很抱歉，所以我撒了谎。\n我是镇上雷击中幸存下来的人，所以你们都安全！

20070204.Original_Text: 어째 와전되어 번개를 맞고도 살아남았다는 말만 남았습니다만...\n그나저나 궁금하다고 확인까지 하러 간 소협도 대단하십니다? 하하!
20070204.English_Text: However, the only thing left was that he survived being struck by lightning...\nBy the way, the small gang who even went to confirm that he was curious is great? Haha!
20070204.Chinese_Text: 不过，唯一剩下的就是被雷击活了下来……\n顺便说一句，那个连去确认他好奇的小帮派都很棒？哈哈！

20070205.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>홍매화</>가 화를 내는 것 같은데 무슨 일이지?)
20070205.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Red plum</> seems to be angry, what's going on?)

20070206.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단장 나으리</>. 저희도 아이를 생각해서 드리는 부탁입니다.\n화내지 말고 긍정적으로 생각해봐 주십시오.
20070206.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>The head of plum blossoms</>. This is a request that we also ask for our children. \nPlease don't get angry and think positively.
20070206.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>梅花头</>。这是我们对孩子的要求。\n请不要生气，积极思考。

20070207.Original_Text: 맞습니다. 이 아이가 피난처에만 남아서 뭐가 되겠습니까?\n그러니 부디 저희 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>봉식이</>를 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>에 받아주세요!
20070207.English_Text: That's right. What would it be like for this child to remain only in the shelter? \nSo please, please change our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bongshik</> to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum flower bed
20070207.Chinese_Text: 没错。这个孩子只留在收容所会是什么感觉？\nSo please，请将我们的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bongshik</>改为<textColor=[78:

20070208.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>은 그런 곳이 아닙니다!\n그 위험한 곳으로 아이를 떠밀어 놓고, 무엇이 아이를 위한다는 것입니까?!
20070208.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Flower Bed</> is not such a place!\nForcing a child into that dangerous place, what is it for a child?!
20070208.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>梅花床</>可不是这样的地方！\n把孩子逼到那种危险的地方，对孩子来说算什么？！

20070209.Original_Text: 아니, 그것은... 우리 애가 비실비실하고 쓸모없으면 데려가지도 않으실까 하여...
20070209.English_Text: No, it's... I'm afraid you won't even take my child if it's filthy and useless...
20070209.Chinese_Text: 不，是……我的孩子又脏又没用，我怕你拿不走……

20070210.Original_Text: (이들이 아이를 어디로 보냈는지 묻는다. \n지금은 화내는 것보다 아이의 안전을 확인하는 게 먼저라 한다.)
20070210.English_Text: (They ask where they sent the child. \nNow they say that it is better to check the safety of the child than to get angry.)
20070210.Chinese_Text: （他们问他们把孩子送到哪里去了。\n现在他们说检查孩子的安全比生气好。）

20070211.Original_Text: 소협, 어느새... 이럴 때가 아니군요. 소협의 말씀이 맞습니다.\n아이의 안전을 확인하는 게 먼저겠죠.
20070211.English_Text: Sohyup, all of a sudden... this is not the time. What the small cooperative is saying is correct. \nChecking the child's safety should be the first thing.
20070211.Chinese_Text: Sohyup，突然之间……现在不是时候，小合作说的没错。\n检查孩子的安全应该是第一件事。

20070212.Original_Text: 아이는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>어둠 숲</>에 두고 왔다고 합니다.\n저는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>을 동원해 올 테니, 소협께서 먼저 아이를 찾아주시겠습니까?
20070212.English_Text: The child said he left it in the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dark Forest</>.
20070212.Chinese_Text: 孩子说他把它留在了<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>黑暗森林</>。

20070214.Original_Text: 감사합니다, 소협. 그러면 한시가 급하니 서둘러주십시오!
20070214.English_Text: Thank you, Sohyeop. Then, the hour is urgent, so please hurry!
20070214.Chinese_Text: 「谢谢你，素赫。那么，时间紧迫，请抓紧时间！」

20070215.Original_Text: 덕분에 아이를 데려올 수 있었습니다.\n주변을 돌아다니던 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>마물</>이 줄어 들키지 않았다고 아이가 말하더군요.
20070215.English_Text: Thanks to that, I was able to bring the child.\nThe child said that the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Monsters</> wandering around had decreased and went unnoticed.
20070215.Chinese_Text: 多亏了这个，我才能把孩子带来。\n孩子说，四处游荡的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>怪物</>减少了，没有被注意到。

20070216.Original_Text: (그렇다니 다행이라고 한다. 그렇지만 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단장</>이 직접 나설 일은 아닌 것 같은데...)
20070216.English_Text: (It is said that it is fortunate. However, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Flower Director</> doesn't seem to be the one to take the initiative...)
20070216.Chinese_Text: （据说是幸运的。不过，<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>梅花总监</>好像不是主动的……）

20070217.Original_Text: 그렇기는 합니다만... 옛날에 있던 일이 생각나서 저도 모르게 나선 것 같습니다.
20070217.English_Text: It is, but... I think I came out without knowing what happened in the past.
20070217.Chinese_Text: 是的，但是……我想我是在不知道过去发生了什么的情况下出来的。

20070219.Original_Text: 혹시 저희 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단의 심하연</>을 기억하십니까?\n그 아이가 저 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>봉식이</>라는 아이랑 같은 경위로 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>에 입단했었죠.
20070219.English_Text: Do you remember our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Maehwadan's Deep Hayeon</>? \nThat child was that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bongsik</
20070219.Chinese_Text: 你还记得我们的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Maehwadan's Deep Hayeon</>吗？\n那个孩子就是那个<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bongsik</

20070220.Original_Text: 지금은 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>을 잘 보살피는 좋은 아이로 자랐습니다만,\n처음 왔을 때는 하루가 멀다하고 어미를 찾았었죠.
20070220.English_Text: Now, I have grown up to be a good child who takes good care of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Flower Plant</>, but when I first came, I was looking for a mother every day.
20070220.Chinese_Text: 现在，我已经成长为一个细心照顾<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>梅花植物</>的好孩子，但是我刚来的时候，我每天都在找妈妈

20070221.Original_Text: 아이를 위한다며 아이를 버리려는 꼴을 보니 어찌나 화가 나던지...\n아이의 부모에게는 따끔히 말해두겠습니다.
20070221.English_Text: I was so angry when I saw someone trying to throw a child away saying it was for the sake of the child... I will tell the child's parents harshly.
20070221.Chinese_Text: 看到有人要扔掉孩子说是为了孩子，我很生气……我会严厉地告诉孩子的父母。

20070222.Original_Text: 소협 덕분에 아이가 무사히 돌아갈 수 있게 됐으니, 이 정도는 제가 할 일이죠.
20070222.English_Text: Thanks to the small cooperative, the child is able to return home safely, so this is my job.
20070222.Chinese_Text: 多亏了小合作，孩子才能平安回家，这就是我的工作。

20070223.Original_Text: 깜짝이야! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>의 미래를 염려하고 있는 중에 뭡니까?\n어라? 소협은 분명... 문주님의 친구분이셨죠?
20070223.English_Text: Surprising! What are you concerned about the future of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>?
20070223.Chinese_Text: 令人惊讶！你对<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>的未来有什么担忧？

20070224.Original_Text: 그렇다면 소협께는 말씀드릴 수 있죠!\n그래야 제가 얼마나 문주님을 생각하는지 문주님도 아실 수 있고...
20070224.English_Text: Then, I can tell Sohyup! \n That way, Master Moon can know how much I care about you...
20070224.Chinese_Text: 那我可以告诉苏赫了！\n这样，月少爷就知道我有多在乎你了……

20070225.Original_Text: 아니, 아니예요! 방금 제가 한 말은 잊어주세요!\n저는 그저 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>의 미래를 생각하고 있었을 뿐이니까요!
20070225.English_Text: No, no! Forget what I just said! \nI was just thinking about the future of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>!
20070225.Chinese_Text: 不，不！忘记我刚才说的话！\n我只是在想<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>的未来！

20070226.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>은 본디 신수를 모시고 따르는 곳이잖아요?\n그러니 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>을 찾는 것을 잊어서는 안 되죠.
20070226.English_Text: Isn't <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> a place where the gods are worshiped and followed?
20070226.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>难道不是供奉神明的地方吗？

20070227.Original_Text: 더군다나 이곳은 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</> 외에 다른 이들이 오지 않던 장소.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>이 어딘가에 숨겨져 있을 가능성은 높아요!
20070227.English_Text: Moreover, this is a place where no one has come except <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</>.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</> is somewhere
20070227.Chinese_Text: 此外，这是一个除了<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>之外没有人来过的地方。\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>生育</>

20070228.Original_Text: 그래서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>을 수색하기 위해 이 일대를 조사해볼 예정이거든요.\n소협도 시간이 괜찮으시다면 도와주시겠어요?
20070228.English_Text: So I'm going to investigate this area to search for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</>.
20070228.Chinese_Text: 所以我将调查这个区域以搜索 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</>。

20070229.Original_Text: 소협께서 저의 헌신적인 모습을 문주님께 전달...\n아니, 저의 임무를 도와주시면 큰 영광이겠어요!
20070229.English_Text: Sohyup delivered my dedication to Moon Ju...\nNo, it would be a great honor if you could help me with my mission!
20070229.Chinese_Text: Sohyup向Moon Ju表达了我的奉献......\nNo，如果你能帮助我完成我的使命，那将是我的荣幸！

20070230.Original_Text: (왠지 흘린 말들이 수상하지만, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>의 수색이라면 도와주겠다고 한다)
20070230.English_Text: (Some of the words are questionable, but they say they will help you with the search for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</>)
20070230.Chinese_Text: （有些词是有问题的，但他们说它们会帮助你搜索<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</>）

20070231.Original_Text: 먼저 근처에 있는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>가라앉은 묘지</>를 수색해보려고요.\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수와족</>들이 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>을 찾아 모셔두고 있었을지도 모르니까요!
20070231.English_Text: First, I'm going to search the nearby <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sunken Cemetery</>.\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Suwa</>
20070231.Chinese_Text: 首先，我要搜索附近的<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>沉没墓地</>。\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>诹访</>

20070232.Original_Text: 이 일대를 전부 돌아봤는데, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>가라앉은 묘지</>에는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>이 없는 것 같아요.
20070232.English_Text: I've looked all over this area and I don't think <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sinked Graveyard</> has <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertilizer</>.
20070232.Chinese_Text: 我已经查看了整个区域，我认为 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sinked Graveyard</> 没有 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertilizer</>

20070233.Original_Text: 그렇지만 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>이 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>을 가져갔을 수도 있잖아요.\n함께 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>전초기지</>를 돌아봐요. 분명 수확이 있을 거예요!
20070233.Chinese_Text: 但是 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blackdawn</> 本来可以<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>生育能力</>。\n与 <textColor= 一起

20070234.Original_Text: 저는 먼저 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>전초기지</>주변을 탐색해보고 있을게요.\n소협도 거기서 뵈어요!
20070234.English_Text: I'll be exploring the area around <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Outpost</> first.
20070234.Chinese_Text: 我将首先探索 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Outpost</> 周围的区域。

20070235.Original_Text: 어휴, 이곳을 샅샅이 뒤져봤는데도 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>은 코빼기도 보이질 않네요.\n빈손으로 돌아가게 될 줄이야.
20070235.English_Text: Ugh, I've searched all over this place, but I can't even find a nose bleed for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</>.
20070235.Chinese_Text: 呃，我找遍了这个地方，但我什至找不到 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</> 的流鼻血。

20070236.Original_Text: 하긴, 문주님도 그렇게 찾아 헤매시는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>을 쉽게 찾을 리가 없긴 하죠...
20070236.English_Text: Actually, it's not easy to find <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</>, which even Lord Moon is looking for...
20070236.Chinese_Text: 实际上，要找到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>生育力</>并不容易，连月亮勋爵都在寻找……

20070237.English_Text: (Still, I will tell <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> about <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Correction</>of their efforts)
20070237.Chinese_Text: （不过，我会告诉 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> 关于 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>更正</>他们的努力）

20070238.Original_Text: 정말요?! 고마워요 소협!\n저는요, 앞으로도 포기하지 않고 계속 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥의 단서</>를 찾을 거예요.
20070238.English_Text: Really?! Thank you, Sohyeop!\nI will never give up and keep looking for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Clues to Fertility</>.
20070238.Chinese_Text: 真的吗？！谢谢你，Sohyeop！\n我永远不会放弃并继续寻找<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>生育线索</>。

20070239.English_Text: Then, one day, even Munju will call me... Woohoo.
20070239.Chinese_Text: 那么，总有一天，连文珠都会叫我……呜呼。

20070240.Original_Text: 소협! 소협을 만나 뵙기를 줄곧 기다려왔습니다!
20070240.English_Text: Sohyup! I've been waiting all the time to meet you!

20070242.Original_Text: 저는 신입 문파원인 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>하은소</>라 합니다! 이 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>을 호령할 꿈을 품고 이번 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>합동 초소</>에도 자원했습니다만...
20070242.English_Text: My name is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ha Eun-so</>, a new member of the clan! I dream of commanding this <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sea Moon Continent</>.
20070242.Chinese_Text: 我的名字是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ha Eun-so</>，部落的新成员！我梦想指挥这个<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>

20070243.Original_Text: 임무를 수행할수록 제 부족함만 느끼게 되더군요.\n이대로는 안 됩니다! 획기적인 수련법이 필요해요!
20070243.English_Text: The more I carry out the mission, the more I feel like I'm lacking.
20070243.Chinese_Text: 我越是执行任务，我就越觉得自己缺乏。

20070244.Original_Text: 소협께서는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>수월평원</>에서 문주님과 검을 맞대었을 정도로 강하시다지요.\n제게도 소협의 수련법을 알려주시겠습니까?
20070244.English_Text: It is said that Sohyeop is strong enough to have a sword with Munju in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Suwol Plain</>.
20070244.Chinese_Text: 据说在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>水月平原</>，Sohyeop强大到足以与Munju一起使用剑。

20070245.Original_Text: (별것 없다며, 그냥 열심히 싸우면 된다고 한다)
20070245.English_Text: (He said it's nothing, just fight hard)

20070246.Original_Text: 절대적인 수련량이 부족하다는 말씀이신가요...\n그렇다면 저도 요령 피울 생각 없이 수련에 매진하겠습니다!
20070246.English_Text: Are you saying that the absolute amount of training is insufficient...\nThen, I will focus on training without even thinking of cheating!
20070246.Chinese_Text: 你是说绝对训练量不够……\n那我就专心训练，连作弊的念头都没有！

20070247.Original_Text: 먼저 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>검은새벽단의 전초기지</>에 있는 녀석들을 처리하면 되겠죠! 그러면 다녀오겠습니다!
20070247.English_Text: First, we'll have to deal with the guys at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Blackdawn's Outpost</>! Then I'll be there!
20070247.Chinese_Text: 首先，我们必须解决<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Blackdawn's Outpost</>的那些家伙！然后我会在那里！

20070248.English_Text: Thank you! I lived thanks to you. Sohyeok...
20070248.Chinese_Text: 谢谢你！多亏了你，我才活了下来。昭赫……

20070249.Original_Text: (무턱대고 강한 상대와 싸운다고 강해지는 것은 아니라고 꾸짖는다)
20070249.English_Text: (I rebuke you that fighting a strong opponent doesn't make you stronger)
20070249.Chinese_Text: （我斥责你，与强大的对手战斗并不能让你变得更强大）

20070250.Original_Text: 소협의 말씀이 맞습니다.\n강한 상대에게 달려드는 것이야말로 요행을 바라는 행동이었다는 걸 이제야 알았습니다.
20070250.English_Text: Sohyup is right. \nI now know that rushing to a strong opponent was the act of wishing for good luck.
20070250.Chinese_Text: Sohyup是对的。\n我现在知道冲向强大的对手是希望好运的行为。

20070251.Original_Text: 과연 무공을 갈고닦는다는 것은 심오하고도 어렵군요. 정답이란 없는 걸까요...
20070251.English_Text: Really, honing martial arts is profound and difficult. Is there no right answer...
20070251.Chinese_Text: 真是的，修炼武功高深莫测，难道没有正确答案吗……

20070252.Original_Text: (초조해봤자 소용없다며 돌아가 가르침에 따르기를 애쓰라 한다)
20070252.English_Text: (They say it's no use to be impatient, and go back and try to follow the teachings)
20070252.Chinese_Text: （他们说不耐烦是没有用的，回去努力遵循教义）

20070253.Original_Text: 알겠습니다, 소협. 비싸게 배운 교훈, 마음 깊이 새기겠습니다.
20070253.English_Text: Okay, Sohyup. The lessons I learned expensively, I will engrave them in my heart.
20070253.Chinese_Text: 好的，苏协。我付出的代价，我会铭记在心。

20070254.Original_Text: 이곳에 있는 수색대 놈들... 강한 줄 알았는데 비리비리하니 형편없잖아!\n거기, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>. 네가 좀 도와줘야겠다.
20070254.English_Text: The search gangs here... I thought they were strong, but they're filthy and dirty! \nThere, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>.
20070254.Chinese_Text: 这里的搜查团伙……我以为他们很强大，但他们又脏又脏！\nThere,<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>。

20070255.Original_Text: 내가 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</>에 내려오는 특별한 수련법을 알고 있는데 말이야...\n이걸 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>이나, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에게 다짜고짜 익히라 하긴 그렇잖아? 네가 시범을 보이는 거야.
20070255.English_Text: I know the special training method that comes down to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>...\nThis is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun<
20070255.Chinese_Text: 我知道归结为<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>的特殊训练方法...\nThis is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun<

20070256.Original_Text: 여기서 알려줄 수는 없고, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>잿빛 하늘 숲</>에서 보자.\n그러면 이따 만나!
20070256.English_Text: I can't tell you here, I'll see you in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Ashen Sky Forest</>. \nThen see you later!
20070256.Chinese_Text: 我不能在这里告诉你，我会在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>灰空森林</>见。\n然后再见！

20070257.Original_Text: 한참 기다렸잖아! 그렇게까지 긴장할 건 없었는데...\n수련법은 간단해. 이곳에 있는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>마물</>들을 처치하는 것이지.
20070257.English_Text: You've been waiting a long time! There was nothing to be so nervous about...\nThe training method is simple. It's about killing the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Monsters</> here.
20070257.Chinese_Text: 你等了很久了！没什么好紧张的……\n训练方法很简单，就是在这里杀<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>怪物</>

20070258.Original_Text: 그렇지만 이건 단순한 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>마물 소탕</>이 아냐.\n이 수련법은 순서와 강도가 중요한데, 최적화된 수련량은 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>금경철문 비전</>으로 내려오고 있지.
20070258.English_Text: However, this is not a simple <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>extermination of monsters</>.\n In this training method, order and intensity are important, and the optimal training amount is <textColor=[255:204:102:
20070258.Chinese_Text: 然而，这不是简单的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>消灭怪物</>。\n在这种训练方法中，顺序和强度很重要，最佳训练量是<textColor=[

20070259.Original_Text: 먼저, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>어둑시니</>들을 처치해 보도록 해.\n네 실력이라면... 이 정도 처치하면 효과를 볼 수 있겠네.
20070259.English_Text: First, try to get rid of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Dick</>.

20070260.Original_Text: 어때. 온몸에 힘이 차오르지 않아?\n이대로만 하면 절정 고수가 될 거라는 예감이 딱! 오지?! 그렇지?!
20070260.English_Text: How do you feel? Doesn't your body feel full of energy? \n If you keep doing this, you have a perfect feeling that you will become a climactic master! Ozzie?! Isn't it?!
20070260.Chinese_Text: 感觉怎么样？是不是感觉身体充满了活力？\n再这样下去，你就有一种完美的感觉，你会成为高潮高手！奥兹？！不是吗？！

20070261.Original_Text: 이제 이 수련을 하루건너 하루!\n꾸준~히 하면 분명 더욱 강해질 거야!
20070261.English_Text: Now, if you do this practice every day, you will definitely become stronger!
20070261.Chinese_Text: 现在，如果你每天都这样修炼，你一定会变得更强！

20070262.Original_Text: 꼭 이 수련법의 효과를 합동 초소 녀석들에게 알려주라고.\n다들 이 몸을 우러러보고 그녀도 나를 다시 볼 수... 아니, 아니야!
20070262.English_Text: Be sure to inform the guys at the Joint Post about the effectiveness of this training method. \nEveryone looks up to this body and she can see me again... No, no!
20070262.Chinese_Text: 一定要把这个训练方法的有效性告诉联合哨所的人。\n所有人仰望这具身体，她又可以看到我了……不，不！
